```{r}
movies <- read_csv("movies.csv")
```
```{r}
summary(movies)
```

```{r}
movies %>% 
  group_by(MOVIES) %>% 
  summarize(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(-count) %>% 
  filter(count > 1)

# All "movies" that have more than 1 entry -> shows
```


```{r}
movies_w_shows <- movies %>% 
  group_by(MOVIES) %>% 
  mutate(movie_or_show = if_else(n() > 1, "show", "movie")) %>% 
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
#write.csv(movies_w_shows, file = "movies_with_names.csv", row.names = F)
```
